states.description: The kitchen counter has a coffee machine, a bag of whole coffee beans, a carton of milk, a pitcher filled with water, and a ceramic mug. The coffee machine is off and empty.
The coffee machine's water reservoir is filled to the indicated line with fresh water. The bag of coffee beans is open.
The coffee machine's grinder is filled with fresh coffee beans. The water reservoir is still full. The ceramic mug is placed under the coffee spout.
The coffee machine is brewing espresso into the ceramic mug. The grinder is empty. The milk carton and a small stainless steel steaming pitcher are on the counter.
A double shot of espresso is in the ceramic mug. The steaming pitcher is filled with cold milk to just below the spout.
The milk is steamed and frothed in the stainless steel pitcher. Small, tight bubbles create a microfoam. The espresso is still in the ceramic mug.
The frothed milk is being carefully poured into the ceramic mug with the espresso. The beginning of a rosetta latte art design is visible.
A perfect latte with a beautiful rosetta latte art design is complete in the ceramic cup. The counter is clean except for the empty milk carton and steaming pitcher.

actions.description: Fill the coffee machine's water reservoir with fresh water.
Open the bag of coffee beans and pour beans into the coffee machine's grinder.
Place the ceramic mug under the coffee spout and start the coffee machine to brew a double shot of espresso.
Pour cold milk into the stainless steel steaming pitcher.
Steam and froth the milk using the coffee machine's steaming wand.
Carefully pour the steamed milk into the ceramic mug with the espresso, creating latte art.
Finish pouring the milk, completing the latte art design.
